songs.title: Shots (Live From Spotify London)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
One, two
One, two, three

[Verse 1]
Am I out of touch? Am I outta my place
When I keep sayin' that I’m lookin' for an empty space?
Oh, wishin' you’re here
But I'm wishin' you're gone

[Refrain]
I can't have you and I'm only gonna do you wrong
Oh, I'ma mess this up
Oh, this is just my luck
Over and over and over agai-ai-ain

[Chorus]
I'm sorry for everything, oh, everything I’ve done
From the second that I was born, it seems I had a loaded gun
Then I shot, shot, shot a hole
Through everything I loved
Oh, I shot, shot, shot a hole
Through every single thing that I loved

[Break]
Whoa, yeah
Come on

[Verse 2]
Am I out of luck? Am I waiting to break
When I keep sayin’ that I'm lookin’ for a way to escape?
Oh, I'm wishin' I had
What I've taken for granted

[Refrain]
I can’t have you and I'm only gonna do you wrong
Oh, I'm gonna mess this up
Oh, this is just my luck
Over and over and over again

[Chorus]
I'm sorry for everything, oh, everything I've done
From the second that I was born, it seems I had a loaded gun
And then I shot, shot, shot a hole
Through everything I loved
Oh, I shot, shot, shot a hole
Through every single thing that I loved

[Bridge]
Whoa, in the meantime, we let it go
At the roadside we used to know
We can let this drift away
Let this drift away
At the bayside, we used to show
In the moonlight, we let it go
We can let this drift away
Let this drift away
There's always time to change your mind
There's always time to change your mind
Oh, love, can you hear me?
Oh, let it drift away-ay-ay

[Chorus]
I'm sorry for everything, oh, everything I've done
From the second that I was born, it seems I had a loaded gun
Then I shot, shot, shot a hole
Through everything I loved
Oh, shot, shot, shot a hole
Through every single thing that I loved

[Bridge]
In the meantime, we let it go
At the roadside that we used to know
We can let this drift away
Let this drift away
At the bayside, we used to show
In the moonlight, we let it go
We can let this drift away
Let this drift away
There's always time to change your mind
There's always time to change your mind
Oh, love, can you hear me?
Oh, let it drift away

[Outro]
Oh!
Oo-oo-ooh
Thank you
Thank you so much
